typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dataflow_paramater as string
}
source(output(
		EMP_ID as integer,
		NAME as string,
		SALARY as integer,
		DEPT_ID as integer,
		LOC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> emp
emp sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[($dataflow_paramater)],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> emptarget
